entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
